Text.Page:
We haven't heard from Elleon's team. He's infamous for not keeping in touch, but Runha's not like that at all.

Doron knows Runha well. See if he has any insights.

Runha? I sent her to provide magical support for Elleon's force.

I believe their destination was the Grand Chapel.

We had little time for status reports. The Scions destroyed the teleportal to hold off pursuit.

We remained behind to send on reinforcements.
